name: Snow Way Home (PriestleyCGD)
description:
You're stuck in the middle of a snowstorm but you need to get home! Sliding down the mountain is the only way. It's dangerous but you have to take the risk to survive. Night is slowly creeping up on you so you have to move quick!

Collect the sun icons to hold back the darkness!

Use the powerups to help you!

Shovel - Removes any obstacles in your way!

Ghosts - Makes you immune to obstacles!

Magnet - Pulls the sun towards you!
